臘.definition: ancient practice of offering sacrifices to the gods in the 12th lunar month; the 12th lunar month; (bound form) (of meat, fish etc) cured in winter, esp. in the 12th lunar month

臘八節.definition: Laba rice porridge festival, on the 8th day of the 12th lunar month

臘八粥.definition: Laba congee, ceremonial rice porridge dish eaten on the 8th day of the 12th month in the Chinese calendar
